TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AppEvents_WorkbookAfterSaveEventHandler(Workbook Wb, bool Success);
.class public auto ansi sealed AppEvents_WorkbookAfterSaveEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AppEvents_WorkbookAfterSaveEventHandler(Wb As Workbook, Success As Boolean)
public delegate void AppEvents_WorkbookAfterSaveEventHandler(Workbook ^ Wb, bool Success);

Docs.param: Returns true if the save operation was successful; otherwise false.
Docs.summary: A Delegate type used to add an event handler for the event. The WorkbookAfterSave event occurs after the workbook is saved.
